summary: This document is a notice of voluntary dismissal filed by plaintiffs Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig in a civil case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and other defendants. The dismissal is without prejudice and without costs to any party, allowing the plaintiffs to potentially refile in the future.

persons.name: Marvin Gerber
persons.context: Marvin Gerber is one of the plaintiffs in the case, representing himself and others similarly situated.

persons.name: Kalma Koenig
persons.context: Kalma Koenig is another plaintiff in the case, representing herself and others similarly situated.

persons.name: Hillary M. Nappi
persons.context: Hillary M. Nappi is one of the attorneys representing the plaintiffs in this case.

persons.name: Frank R. Schirripa
persons.context: Frank R. Schirripa is another attorney representing the plaintiffs in this case.

persons.name: Daniel B. Rehns
persons.context: Daniel B. Rehns is also an attorney representing the plaintiffs in this case.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is named as one of the defendants in the civil case.

keyFacts: Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig filed a notice of voluntary dismissal in their civil case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and other defendants.
The dismissal is without prejudice, meaning the plaintiffs can potentially refile the case in the future.
The notice indicates that the dismissal is without costs to any party involved in the case.
